japanese: ねえねえ、三玖ちゃん！
translation: Hey hey, Miku-chan!

japanese: 聞いてもいい？
translation: Can we ask you something?

japanese: なに？
translation: What is it?

japanese: 三玖ちゃん、上杉君と付き合ってるわけだよね？
translation: Miku-chan, you're dating Uesugi-kun, right?

japanese: う、うん、そうだけど。
translation: Y-yeah, that's right.

japanese:
（隠してるわけじゃないから、
　私とフータローのこと、とっくに
　クラスのみんなも知ってるんだけど……）
translation:
(It's not like I'm hiding it,
 everyone in the class already
 knows about Futaro and I...)

japanese: それで、上杉君とはどこまで進んでるの？
translation: So, how far have you gone with him?

japanese:
……え？
えええええええぇっ！？
translation:
...Wha-?
WHAAAAAAAAA-?!

japanese: あ、これは進んでないと見た。
translation: Oh, I see. You haven't gone that far yet.

japanese: な、な、なな、なんで……そんなこと……。
translation: W-w-w-w, why...would you ask that...

japanese:
だってさ、三玖ちゃんと上杉君って
割と謎な組み合わせだし。
translation:
I mean, you and Uesugi-kun
are a pretty mysterious pair, you know?

japanese: ２人が付き合うなんて想像もしてなかったよ。
translation:
I never would have imagined
that you two would start dating.

japanese:
そんな２人は、果たして
うまくいっているのでしょうか？
translation: So, I was just wondering if you guys are still doing well together?

japanese: って、クラスのみんなも興味津々なわけ。
translation: Actually, everyone in class is curious to know as well, you know?

japanese: クラスのみんなも！？
translation: Everyone in the class, too?!

japanese:
だって、もうすぐ卒業でしょ？
その前に告白しようって考えてる子も結構いるんだよ。
translation:
Well, graduation is coming up soon, right?
There are quite a few girls
who are thinking of confessing before then.

japanese:
となると、現在進行形で付き合ってる２人が
気になってくるんだよねー。
translation:
So, I guess people are starting to wonder
if you guys are really currently dating or not.

japanese:
どうなの？　どうなの？
卒業してもちゃんとやっていけそう？
translation:
And? How are things?
Do you think you guys will be able to stay together
after graduation?

japanese:
どうって言われても……。
付き合う前とそんなに変わってないし……。
translation:
You ask me all these things...
But, it really hasn't changed since
before we started dating...

japanese: ２人きりで出かけることが増えたくらい、かな？
translation:
Maybe we just go out together a little more now.
That's about it.

japanese: 泊りで？
translation: Did you guys spend the night together?

japanese:
そ、そんなわけない！
日帰りで！
translation:
W-what?
No way! We went home the same day!

japanese: あー……。
translation: Ahhh...

japanese:
ほらね、言った通りだよ。
上杉君って見るからに草食系だし、
勉強しか興味なさそうだって。
translation:
See, I told you. Uesugi-kun doesn't seem to be interested
in pursuing girls,
he seems to be only interested in studying.

japanese:
ああ見えて彼女の前ではオオカミ、
なんてギャップに期待したんだけどな。
translation:
I was hoping he would at least turn into an alpha wolf
in front of his girlfriend.

japanese: お、オオカミ！？
translation: A-a wolf?!

japanese: そう、男はみんなオオカミ！
translation: Yes! Men are ALL feral!

japanese:
しかも三玖ちゃん、めちゃくちゃ可愛いんだよ？
上杉君、よく我慢できるなー。
translation:
And on top of that, you are SO cute, Miku-chan.
I wonder how Uesugi-kun manages to hold himself back.

japanese: さすがにキスくらいはもうした？
translation: Have you guys kissed yet?

japanese:
えっ、キス？
そ、そ、それは……。
translation:
K-kiss?
W-w-well...

japanese: それは？
translation: Well?

japanese:
（したことはあるけど、学園祭の時はまだ
　付き合ってなかったし私から勝手にしちゃったし、
　あれはどうなるんだろ！？）
translation:
(I did kiss Futaro before at the school festival,
 but we weren't dating yet, and I just impulsively kissed him.
 I wonder if that kiss mean't anything!)

japanese:
ええー！？
キスもまだなの？
translation:
Huhhh?!
You still haven't kissed him?

japanese: あ、あの、えっと……。
translation: U-um, uhh...

japanese: 上杉君、草食系すぎる！
translation: Uesugi-kun's so MEEK!

japanese:
学園祭から付き合ってるんだよね？
だったら半年だし、キスくらいはと思ったのに。
translation:
You've been dating ever since the school festival, right?
It's already been six months,
so I thought you two would have at least kissed.

japanese: ……それが普通なの？
translation: ...Is that normal?

japanese: キスなんて、恋人同士なら特別なことじゃないかな。
translation: Kissing is a normal thing for couples.

japanese: そっかー、半年でキスもまだかー。
translation:
I see, so you haven't kissed yet,
even though it's been six months...

japanese: 半年じゃない、まだ５ヶ月。
translation: Not six. Only five months.

japanese:
大してかわんないって。
それだけ経ってれば普通、いくとこまでいくよ？
translation:
Yea only a one month difference, though.
If it's been that long, isn't it normal
to take things to the next level?

japanese: いくとこ……！？
translation: The next level?!

japanese:
あははっ！
三玖ちゃんってホント可愛い！
translation:
Ahaha!
Miku-chan, you are just so cute!

japanese: か、からかわないで……。
translation: D-don't tease me...

japanese:
ごめんって！
ついイジりたくなっちゃうんだよね。
translation: Sorry! I just can't resist.

japanese:
ホント、あの上杉君にこんな彼女がいるなんて、
未だに信じられないよ。
translation:
I just can't believe
Uesugi-kun could get himself a girlfriend like you.

japanese:
そんなことない。
私はフータローが――
translation:
That's not true.
I think Futaro is..
Ah!

japanese: そっか、そんなに好きなんだ。
translation: I see, you like him that much, huh.

japanese: ……うん。
translation: ...Yeah.

japanese:
うわぁ！
なんなの、この可愛さ！　上杉君の幸せ者～！
translation:
Awww!
You're such a cutey?!
Uesugi-kun is such a lucky guy!

japanese:
まあ、さっきのは少し大げさに言ったけど、
上杉君って東京の大学に行くんだよね？
だとすると心配かも。
translation:
Well, I may have exaggerated a bit earlier,
but Uesugi-kun is going to a university in Tokyo,
right? In that case, I'm a little worried.

japanese: え？
translation: Why?

japanese:
遠距離恋愛だもん。
お節介かもしれないけど、その前に
一歩くらいは進んでおくといいんじゃないかな。
translation:
It'll be a long-distance relationship. I don't mean
to interfere, but it might be good to take the relationship to the next level before that happens.

japanese:
そうそう。
深い関係になっておいたほうが絶対いい！
translation:
Yeah, that's right.
It's definitely better to deepen your relationship
before that!

japanese: 深い、関係……！？
translation: Deepen, our relationship?!

japanese:
こんな可愛い彼女を残していくんだもん、
上杉君は割とその気だったりして。
translation:
Uesugi-kun probably is dwelling over the thought of
having to leave behind someone as cute as you.

japanese: なんだかんだ言っても、男はオオカミだもんね。
translation: To be fair, guys can't control themselves.
Huh...
